item.title: Amy add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Amy add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Amy add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Amy add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Amy add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "Lolita, light of my life, fire of my loins. My sin, my soul. Lo-lee-ta: the tip of the tongue taking a trip of three steps down the palate to tap, at three, on the teeth. Lo. Lee. Ta. She was Lo, plain Lo, in the morning, standing four feet ten in one sock. She was Lola in slacks. She was Dolly at school. She was Dolores on the dotted line. But in my arms she was always Lolita. Did she have a precursor? She did, indeed she did. In point of fact, there might have been no Lolita at all had I not loved, one summer, an initial girl-child. In a princedom by the sea. Oh when? About as many years before Lolita was born as my age was that summer. You can always count on a murderer for a fancy prose style. Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, exhibit number one is what the seraphs, the misinformed, simple, noble-winged seraphs, envied. Look at this tangle of thorns." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Alas! Earwax!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Where your treasure is, there will your heart be also." -- Anonymous

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Nitwit! Blubber! Oddment! Tweak!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It was, he thought, the difference between being dragged into the arena to face a battle to the death and walking into the arena with your head held high. Some people, perhaps, would say that there was little to choose between the two ways, but Dumbledore knew - and so do I, thought Harry, with a rush of fierce pride, and so did my parents - that there was all the difference in the world." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Dumbledore will only leave from Hogwarts when there are none loyal to him!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Amy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Amy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Today is the sort of day where the sun only comes up to humiliate you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Amy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If you're going to read this, don't bother." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Amy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "By the time you read this, you'll be older than you remember." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Amy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "What people forget is a journey to nowhere starts with a single step, too." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Amy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The only difference between a suicide and a martyrdom really is the amount of press coverage." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "THE EDGE, there is no honest way to explain it because the only people who really know where it is are the ones who have gone over." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "If you try and lose then it isn't your fault. But if you don't try and we lose, then it's all your fault." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Amy add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Madness, and then illumination." -- Orson Scott Card
